CombinationGallery.heading: Variations
CombinationGallery.content: Compact yet incredibly versatile, a bundle of two tables will fit into any home or office.

aesthetic.name: Aestetic
aesthetic.heading: Convertible and elegant
aesthetic.body: Simple design and thoughtful function combined in a compact format and symmetrical shape impress with versatility and leave you a wide field of possibilities. The beveled wooden surfaces appear solid, but retain their elegant lightness. Carved from one single piece, the vivid grain of the oak continues along the edges, giving the impression of a single solid wooden ashlar.

material.name: Materials
material.heading: Premium Oak Wood
material.body: Three sturdy natural wood plates give the table its basic shape and distinct minimalist look. Made of high-grade oak wood they provide excellent qualities and are the perfect choice for a long-lasting and sustainable piece of furniture. Through our gentle treatment with high quality and environmentally friendly oils and waxes, we preserve the natural appearance of the wood and create a resilient surface that ages gracefully.

manufacture.name: Manufacture
manufacture.heading: Handcrafted unique pieces
manufacture.body: We work diligently with the best and most modern tools: our hands. They transform the raw unprocessed wood into supple furniture that meets our highest standards. We exclusively process wood from local forests.

page.heading: Thank you!
page.body: We have sent you an email with more information regarding your purchase.
page.refer: Refer a friend and get a discount of up to

page.heading: Maybe later
page.body: Tell us what we can do better. We welcome any advice for improvement!

CookieConsent.heading: Oh look, another website that uses cookies.
CookieConsent.info: It's how we can learn and iterate to provide you with the best possible experience. Find out more in our Privacy Policy.

two.body: The allrounder for every living space

disclaimer.heading: Handcraft takes time
disclaimer.body: We try to keep up with the demand as best as we can. Please expect delivery times between 1-3 weeks.
